hero.title: Stand out on Google Maps
hero.description: Turn people who find you on Google Search and Maps into new customers with a Business Profile for your storefront or service area

visibility.title: Enhanced Local Visibility
visibility.description: Appear in local search results when potential customers look for businesses like yours. Show up on maps, making it easy for people to find your physical location.

trust.title: 24/7 Business Information
trust.description: Provide round-the-clock access to your business information including operating hours, contact details, and special announcements.

traffic.title: Free Business Promotion
traffic.description: Get a powerful marketing tool at zero cost. Showcase your business hours, contact information, photos, and services without paying for advertising.

engagement.title: Customer Reviews & Trust
engagement.description: Build credibility through customer reviews and ratings. Positive reviews act as social proof and help attract new customers to your business.
